 Binds the Cursor column defined by the specified index to the specified widget.

Detailed Description

This class can be used by external clients of SimpleCursorListItemProvider to bind values fom the Cursor to wdigets.

You should use this class to bind values from the Cursor to widgets that are not directly supported by SimpleCursorListItemProvider or to change the way binding occurs for widgets supported by SimpleCursorListItemProvider.

See also:
bindWidget(gaia::core::Widget*, gaia::core::Context*, gaia::storage::Cursor*)
setWidgetImage(ImageWidget*, const gaia::base::String&)
setWidgetText(TextWidget*, const gaia::base::String&)

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::WidgetBinder::setWidgetValue ( gaia::core::Widget *  widget,
gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor,
int32_t  columnIndex 
) [pure virtual]

Binds the Cursor column defined by the specified index to the specified widget.

When binding is handled by this WidgetBinder, this method must return true. If this method returns false, SimpleCursorListItemProvider will attempts to handle the binding on its own.

Parameters:
widgetthe widget to bind the data to
cursorthe cursor to get the data from
columnIndexthe column at which the data can be found in the cursor
Returns:
true if the data was bound to the widget, false otherwise
